name: Bandai Dragon Ball Super Evolve Super Saiyan 3 Son Goku figure
description:
Unleash the ultimate Saiyan power with the BANDAI Dragon Ball Super Evolve Super Saiyan 3 Son Goku figure! This meticulously crafted figure captures the awe-inspiring presence of Goku in his most iconic transformation. Prepare to be blown away by the incredible detail and dynamic pose that brings this legendary Saiyan warrior to life.

The Super Saiyan 3 Son Goku figure is a must-have for any Dragon Ball fan or collector. It showcases Goku´s electrifying Super Saiyan 3 form, with its flowing golden hair, piercing blue eyes, and the raw power emanating from his every muscle. The figure´s dynamic pose perfectly captures Goku´s intensity and determination as he prepares to unleash his full power.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this figure boasts exceptional quality and craftsmanship. From the intricate sculpting of Goku´s hair and clothing to the vibrant paint application, every aspect of this figure has been designed to impress. The figure is also highly articulated, allowing you to pose Goku in a variety of dynamic stances and recreate your favorite moments from the Dragon Ball Super anime.

Features:

* Highly detailed sculpt and paint application
* Dynamic pose captures Goku´s power and intensity
* Articulated for a wide range of poses

Technical Specifications:

* Brand: BANDAI
* Series: Dragon Ball Super Evolve
* Character: Son Goku
* Transformation: Super Saiyan 3
* Material: PVC
* Height: Approximately 6 inches

Add the BANDAI Dragon Ball Super Evolve Super Saiyan 3 Son Goku figure to your collection today and experience the power of a true Saiyan warrior!
